name: HoppyScotchy (Epiphany Dev Game Jam)
description:
Introduction:

Being able to relive the childhood that we crave for, was the reason this idea came into being. We all used to play Hopscotch a.k.a Langri-Pala, with our friends in the streets after school. This game was an attempt to imitate the original game.

Controls:

   - Use Right Click and Drag the mouse to set the stone Trajectory.

   - Use Left Click to throw the stone.   

   - For Single Leg Jump on the tile, Press '1'.

   - For Two Leg Jump on the tiles, Press '2'.

   - To Skip the tile with the stone, Press 'Spacebar'.

Gameplay:

You have to toss the stone to a numbered tile starting from "1"  and then hop or jump through the spaces skipping the the tile at which the stone is thrown at while ascending or descending. The round is completed once you take a round from 1 to 10 and then 10 to 1 and the game is completed when you have thrown stone to the last number and hopped all the way and back.

The left- side of the screen is your area, while, the right-side of the screen is your opponent. Time will increase with every wrong jump you make.
